label: AppliedChemicalTreatment
comment: A process of applying a chemical, physical, or biological agent to an object.

datatypeProperties.comment: A specified temperature value or range of values.
The name, expressed as text, of the method of this applied chemical treatment.
A proof that a document is genuine.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.

referencedBy.comment: A chemical treatment applied as required by this cross-border regulatory procedure.
